pages.text: Chthonic crystals are important for powerful Terramity items.$(br2)Chthonic crystals are best found by mining brimslag. Brimslag can only be mined by a virentium, cosmilite, dimlite, iridium pickaxe or better.
Brimslag can be found anywhere in the Nether where blackstone can be found, but is most common in the basalt deltas.
